parts.alternateRocket: Green Bubble Engine That's probably because of this you've crashed your ship.
parts.balloon: Balloon Your life is hanging by a single thread.
parts.bubbleMachine: Bubble Machine There's nothing smoother than bubbles.
parts.cockpit: Cockpit It's the safest cockpit you've found.
parts.footBall: Foot Ball How many balls you have doesn't really matter.
parts.hat: Hat A Hat gifted by the Moon.
parts.magnet: Magnet Catch your dreams, then drop them.
parts.pillow: Pillow At least you can rest until you figure out how to repair your ship.
parts.umbrella: Umbrella Really useful when it's raining. But it's not.
parts.veryBigRocket: Very Big Rocket Well, that's a big rocket.
parts.weight: Weight It's a simple weight. Don't expect much.
lose.tooHigh: You can't go to space in a makeshift ship!
lose.tooLeft: Salvation is not this way! Trust us, we checked.
lose.crash: Gather your parts and try again! Not enough duct tape perhaps?
